packageName: Example snapshot created from a PingFederate export

items.name: CIAM Mobile App
items.description: This client is used to perform OIDC logons with a Mobile App with CIAM Push capabilities

items.name: Delegator
items.description: This client is used to Authenticate to Delegator

items.name: Facile - Consent Enforcement
items.description: This client is used to enable Redirectless logon to the PA-protected Consent Enforcement SPA

items.name: Facile - PingAccess
items.description: This client is used by PingAccess to create Web Sessions for Facile Applications

items.name: Ping Admin
items.description: This client is used to perform OIDC SSO logon to Ping Admin consoles

items.name: Ping Introspect
items.description: This client is used to Introspect and validate PF-issued access_tokens

items.name: Ping Logon
items.description: This client is used to perform OIDC logons - Experience managed with Extended Properties

items.name: Ping Logon - Widget
items.description: This client is used to perform OIDC logons - defaults to use the PF AuthN API Widget

items.name: PingOne Logon
items.description: This client is used to logon to PingOne App Portal - Experience managed with Extended Properties

items.name: Ping Redirectless
items.description: This client is used to perform 1st Party AuthN API authentications

items.name: Ping Services
items.description: This client is used by Services to ask for API Tokens (Client_Credentials)

items.name: Foo Facile - PingAccess
items.description: This client is used by PingAccess to create Web Sessions for the Utile App. This is pegged to the Internal AuthN Policy to remove the need for an Admin LIP connection
